variant.name: CompiledModelLoad
variant.summary: Time to load the compiled .mlmodelc file.

variant.name: MLModelCompile
variant.summary: Time to compile the generated .mlmodel file.

variant.name: MLModelTranslate
variant.summary: Time to translate from webnn graph to CoreML representation and serializes to disk.

variant.name: MLModelWrite
variant.summary: Time to write the temporary .mlmodel file.

variant.name: MLWeightsWrite
variant.summary: Time to write the temporary weights.bin file.

variant.name: ModelOutputRead
variant.summary: Time it took to read back the inference results.

variant.name: ModelPredict
variant.summary: Time predictionFromFeatures took on the model.

histogram.name: WebNN.CoreML.TimingMs.{WebNNCoreMLActions}
histogram.summary: The time taken to perform a WebNN CoreML action. This includes model creation, model compilation, and model inference.
